channel.title: How do I change these things..?
channel.description:
Using MightyScape, I think its based on Pimpscape source. I will keep credits for MightyScape maker on that second picture. Question is: How do I change those things? "welcoming screen" and that Mightyscape server, players on etc. [img]http://runepixels.com/uimages6/moparapua.PNG[/img] [img]http://runepixels.com/uimages5/moparapua2.PNG[/img]
(I hope this is in right board) And I hope step-by-step tutorials.

item.title: How do I change these things..?
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

You haven’t really explained your question.

But I’m going to guess your asking how to change the server name at the top. Simple enter your client.java, hit Ctrl+F, and type in ‘Mightyscape’, when you get Mightyscape highlighted in your client, simply edit it to your server name and save as, compile, and run.

Also for the menu one, just follow the same process.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change these things..?
